title: Sunlight Countdown
summary: Sunlight Countdown is beautiful app for true sunlight lovers.
description: Sunlight Countdown is a beautiful app for true sunlight lovers. It shows you how much time you've got left till sunset or - if you're more of a vampire type - you can check how much night life remains till sunrise. Sunlight Countdown features dynamic UI specific for current state of the day. You can also take the advange of customizable widget to have all relevant information right on your desktop or set notifications to remind you every upcoming sunset. descriptionHTML:
Sunlight Countdown is a beautiful app for true sunlight lovers. It shows you how much time you've got left till sunset or - if you're more of a vampire type - you can check how much night life remains till sunrise.

Sunlight Countdown features dynamic UI specific for current state of the day. You can also take the advange of customizable widget to have all relevant information right on your desktop or set notifications to remind you every upcoming sunset.

If you use awesome Roman Nurik's Dashclock(http://goo.gl/7Z59bJ) app you can use Sunlight Countdown extension as well.

coming soon:
android wear improvements
moon phases
solar events
tablet support
comments: Almost Perfect Would give it 5 stars if it also had a countdown to local solar noon and an option to set user defined locations rather than using the devices location. Other than that it's a great app.
Super Sache. Gefällt mir wirklich gut. Aber hab ein Problem mit den Widget das friert immer ein und bleibt stehen... bitte beheben
Top notch Excellent simple UI, nice looking widget with some options (better than none). Please fix widget refresh, or add interval option.
Needs more customization. I don't need to be alerted a full 45-60 minutes before the sun sets
Great app This app is so cool and the UI and UX is amazing with flat material colors
